article.title: Quantifying the AGN-driven outflows in ULIRGs (QUADROS) I: VLT/Xshooter observations of 9 nearby objects

response:
## Figure 1:  The UVB-VIS-NIR spectrum for F13305-1739.

**Question:** What is the unit of the flux scale in the spectrum presented in Figure 1? 

a) erg s<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-2</sup> ˚A<sup>-1</sup> 
b) 10<sup>-16</sup> erg s<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-2</sup> ˚A<sup>-1</sup> 
c) 10<sup>-16</sup> erg s cm<sup>-2</sup> ˚A<sup>-1</sup> 
d) erg s cm<sup>-2</sup> ˚A<sup>-1</sup> 

**Answer:** b) 10<sup>-16</sup> erg s<sup>-1</sup> cm<sup>-2</sup> ˚A<sup>-1</sup> 


## Figure 3: A best fit STARLIGHT model for F13305-1739.

**Question:** What does the black line in Figure 3 represent?

a) The model spectrum from STARLIGHT.
b) The Xshooter spectrum. 
c) The combined Xshooter and STARLIGHT spectrum.
d) The residuals after subtracting the STARLIGHT model from the Xshooter spectrum.

**Answer:** b) The Xshooter spectrum.


## Figure 4: [OIII]λλ4959,5007 profiles of individual sources.

**Question:** What does the dotted blue line in Figure 4 represent?

a) Individual Gaussian components of the model fit.
b) The fitting residuals. 
c) The underlying stellar continuum.
d) The noise in the spectrum.

**Answer:** b) The fitting residuals.


## Figure 6: A comparison of the velocity shifts of the broad components for the trans-auroral blends and Hβ emission-lines.

**Question:**  What does Figure 6 demonstrate about the kinematics of the broad components of the trans-auroral blends and Hβ emission-lines?

a) They have significantly different kinematics.
b) They have similar kinematics.
c) The trans-auroral blend components are always redshifted, while the Hβ components are always blueshifted.
d) The trans-auroral blend components are always blueshifted, while the Hβ components are always redshifted.

**Answer:** b) They have similar kinematics.


## Figure 8: Determining the densities and reddenings from the total fluxes of the trans-auroral [OII] and [SII] emission-lines.

**Question:** What does the black text in Figure 8 indicate?

a) The electron density sequence.
b) The E(B-V) sequence.
c) The line ratios for the different ULIRGs.
d) The best-fit model for the trans-auroral line ratios.

**Answer:** a) The electron density sequence.
